short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple trick to automatically get energized and focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deep Breathing should be a part of our everyday life. It not only can lengthen the years that we get to live, but can make us happier, more productive and energetic living them too.
